price: Ilẹ̀, A tẹ́ ẹ pẹrẹsẹ. A sì ju àwọn àpáta tó dúró gbagidi sínú rẹ̀. A sì mú gbogbo n̄ǹkan tí ó ní òdíwọ̀n hù jáde láti inú rẹ̀.
arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَدَدۡنَٰهَا وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مَّوۡزُونٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wal-arḍa madadnāhā wa-alqaynā fīhā rawāsiya wa-anbatnā fīhā min kulli shayin mawzūnin
